dimensions:

title: Bedcover
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave.
description: Three scenes of children within a diamond lattice grid of leaves and berries. In purple on white. Textile is made up as a bedcover which is quilted, stuffed and lined.
name: Bedcover
